title: Manual Tester Trainee
description:
**Position** : Software Tester Trainee

**Experience :** 0 To 6 Months

**Location** : Madurai

**Salary :** 12000/PM To 150000/PM

**Job Description :**

As a Software Testing professional, the primary role is to ensure the quality and reliability of software applications through testing and defect identification. Close collaboration with the development team and stakeholders is essential to understand project requirements and design effective test plans. Execution of test cases, timely reporting of issues, and meticulous maintenance of comprehensive test documentation are key responsibilities.

**Roles and responsibilities:**

· **Test Planning:** Developing test plans, strategies, and test cases based on project requirements and specifications.

· **Test Execution:** Performing manual testing to validate software functionality, identify defects, and ensure quality assurance.

· **Defect Reporting:** Documenting and reporting software defects, bugs, and issues using bug tracking systems, including clear steps to reproduce them.

· **Test Documentation:** Creating and maintaining test documentation, including test cases, test scripts, test data, and test reports.

· **Test Environment Setup:** Preparing and configuring the test environment, including hardware, software, and network configurations, Web developer tools, to replicate the production environment.

· **Regression Testing:** Conducting regression tests to ensure that changes or enhancements to software do not negatively impact existing functionality.

· **Test Data Management:** Creating, maintaining, and managing test data sets used for testing, ensuring data integrity and confidentiality.

· **Collaboration:** Collaborating with developers, business analysts, project managers, and other stakeholders to clarify requirements, resolve issues, and ensure effective communication throughout the testing process.

· **Continuous Improvement:** Keeping up with industry trends, new tools, and methodologies, and continuously improving testing processes and techniques

· **GigaMe Web Content:** Contributed efforts to post content on the GigaMe platform

· **Find the bug root:** If any bug is raised or appears in live, I find the cause of the bug and report it to the respective team, while also informing the cause to the lead person.

· **Team Building:** As part of my role, I am responsible for providing training to new joiners when the company hires them. I take the initiative to conduct training sessions and ensure that the new team members receive the necessary knowledge and skills to integrate into our team effectively.

· **JIRA Management:** I am responsible for managing JIRA, including following up on meeting minutes and assigning tasks to the respective individuals in JIRA. Additionally, I handle the process of raising bugs in JIRA, ensuring that they are properly documented and tracked. By effectively managing JIRA, I help streamline the project workflow and facilitate efficient collaboration among team members.

· **Testing the Application:** Currently, I am responsible for testing the application logins for both employers and recruiters. I meticulously identify and document any bugs or issues encountered during testing, and share the bug list with the team.

· **Testing Every Process:** In addition to application testing, I also conduct parallel testing for every process implemented by developers. This ensures that all aspects of the application are thoroughly tested. I maintain a continuous testing approach to ensure ongoing quality assurance throughout the development lifecycle.

· **Content Testing** : Need support from the development content writing testing report

· **Report** : Once 15th Need to share your PMS Report and improve your performance month on month and sort out entire GigaMe platforms bugs .

· The R&R policy may be modified and updated in the future to add more points .

title: Servicenow Tester
description:

title: Quality Analyst
description:
Quality Analyst will be responsible to lead manual testing efforts at a module level. You would be an independent contributor who will design/write complex test scenarios. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches. You will ensure that our products, applications, and systems work correctly when implemented at the client site

Duties and Responsibilities

* Understand/ Analyse Requirements/ coverage at the module level
* Design / Write complex Test scenarios. Prepare Test artifacts like Test Plans, Test Specifications, Test Reports and provide inputs for Test Strategy
* Create and validate Test Data
* Test / Execute Complex Test Cases / Scenarios / End to End Testing
* Demonstrate domain Knowledge and interact with Client
* Manage defects by logging, updating status of defect, follow up on defects (getting fixes and re-test) and ensure successful closure of the defect
* Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle
* To complete testing in line with agreed timeframes and by following the documented business processes using the appropriate test management and automation tools.

Skills / Attributes Required:

* Strong experience in the SAAS domain
* Proven experience as a QA tester
* Experience in QA methodology
* Familiarity with Agile frameworks and regression testing is a plus
* Ability to document and troubleshoot errors
* Working knowledge of test management software
* Excellent communication (verbal & written) skills
* Attention to detail
* Analytical mind and problem-solving aptitude
* Strong organizational skills
* Proven ability to work under pressure
* Identifying Risks and ensure timely escalations

title: Mobile Tester
description:
**Mobile application testers must have knowledge about dart and flutter.**

* **Btech is a must.**
* **MCA or BCA candidate not required.**
* **Dart and Flutter Tester Only**

**We are seeking a detail-oriented and technically proficient individual to join our team as an App Tester**. The ideal candidate will be responsible for thoroughly evaluating mobile applications to identify and report bugs, ensure functionality, and contribute to overall software quality. The App Tester will work closely with the development team to deliver high-quality and user-friendly applications(**Dart and Flutter Tester Only**).

**Responsibilities:**

**-Testing and Quality Assurance:**

* Conduct thorough testing of mobile applications to identify bugs, glitches, and usability issues.
* Perform functional, regression, and performance testing to ensure software stability and reliability.

**-Test Planning and Execution:**

* Develop and execute comprehensive test plans based on project specifications.
* Collaborate with the development team to understand application features and functionality.

**-Bug Reporting:**

* Document and report defects, issues, and inconsistencies in a clear and detailed manner.
* Work closely with developers to provide necessary information for issue resolution.

**-Test Automation:**

* Develop and execute automated test scripts to enhance testing efficiency.
* Identify opportunities for test automation and work towards continuous improvement.

**-Compatibility Testing:**

* Ensure applications function seamlessly across various devices, operating systems, and screen resolutions.

**-Collaboration:**

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and designers, to ensure a unified and high-quality product.

**-User Experience Testing:**

* Evaluate the user interface and overall user experience to ensure it meets design and usability standards.

**-Performance Testing:**

* Conduct performance testing to assess the responsiveness, stability, and speed of the applications.

**Requirements:**

* **Technical Proficiency:**
* Strong understanding of mobile application development processes and technologies.
* Familiarity with testing frameworks and tools.
* **Analytical Skills:**
* Ability to analyze requirements and develop effective test cases.
* Strong problem-solving skills to identify and articulate issues.
* **Communication Skills:**
* Clear and concise communication skills to effectively report bugs and issues.
* Ability to collaborate and communicate with cross-functional teams.
* **Attention to Detail:**
* Meticulous attention to detail to ensure thorough testing and accurate bug reporting.
* **Test Planning and Strategy:**
* Develop and execute comprehensive test plans and test cases for mobile applications.
* Collaborate with the development team to understand application features and requirements.
* **Functional Testing:**
* Conduct functional testing to ensure that all features of the mobile application work correctly across different devices and operating systems.
* Identify, isolate, and document defects or issues encountered during testing.
* **Compatibility Testing:**
* Perform compatibility testing across multiple devices, screen sizes, and operating systems.
* Ensure that the mobile application performs consistently across various configurations.
* **Performance Testing:**
* Conduct performance testing to assess the responsiveness, stability, and speed of the mobile application.
* Identify and address performance bottlenecks and issues.
* **Usability Testing:**
* Evaluate the user interface and user experience of the mobile application.
* Provide feedback and suggestions for improving usability and user engagement.
* **Regression Testing:**
* Conduct regression testing to ensure that new features or updates do not negatively impact existing functionality.
* **Maintain and update regression test suites as needed.**
* **Documentation:**
* **Create and maintain detailed test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and test reports.**
* Track and report on testing progress and results.

**Education and Experience:**

* **Software Engineering.**
* **Dart and Flutter Tester Only.**
* **Btech is a must.**
* **MCA or BCA candidate not required.**

Previous experience as a Software Tester or QA Analyst, particularly in mobile app testing, is preferred, **with experience of 6 months minimum**.

title: Manual Tester
description:

* Should have good problem-solving skills and should be innovative in approach to solutions
* Should be able to adapt to a highly quality-oriented environment that moves in a very aggressive pace
* Working knowledge of ITAM tools like SNOW, FlexNet, SCCM, MAP, ILMT etc. is a big plus
* Knowledge of various licensing metrics of top publishers like Microsoft, Adobe, Client etc. is preferred
* Knowledge of various engagement/contract types offered by top publishers like Microsoft: EA, Adobe: TLP, CLP etc. is a plus

title: Automation Engineer
description:
**About Us:**  
Xotiv Technologies is a pioneering force in the IT sector, committed to delivering cutting-edge solutions that redefine industry standards. We specialize in infrastructure, banking, legal, & telecom technologies, leveraging innovation and technology to drive measurable impact for our clients. At Xotiv Technologies, we foster a culture of collaboration, creativity, and continuous learning, empowering our team members to unleash their full potential and make a meaningful contribution to our mission.

**Job Description:**  
We are currently seeking a talented QA Automation Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 5 years of experience in automation testing, with a proven track record of designing and implementing robust test automation frameworks. As a QA Automation Engineer at Xotiv Technologies, you will play a key role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our software products through the development and execution of automated test scripts.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including software developers, product managers, and quality assurance professionals to understand project requirements and develop comprehensive test plans
* Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts using industry-leading tools and frameworks (e.g., Selenium WebDriver, Appium, TestNG, JUnit) to validate software functionality and performance
* Execute automated test suites and analyze test results to identify defects, track issues, and ensure timely resolution
* Continuously improve test automation processes and frameworks to enhance efficiency, reliability, and test coverage
* Participate in code reviews and provide feedback on testability and quality aspects of the codebase
* Work closely with manual testers to coordinate testing efforts and ensure comprehensive test coverage across all platforms and devices
* Monitor test environments and collaborate with the DevOps team to ensure availability and stability of test infrastructure
* Stay up-to-date on emerging trends and best practices in automation testing and incorporate them into our testing processes

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* Minimum of 5 years of experience in automation testing, with a strong foundation in test automation principles and methodologies
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or C#
* Hands-on experience with automation tools and frameworks such as Selenium WebDriver, Appium, TestNG, JUnit, etc.
* Solid understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with meticulous attention to detail
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment
* Proven ability to manage multiple priorities and deliver results in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines
* Knowledge of web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and HTTP protocols
* Familiarity with mobile application testing on iOS and Android platforms
* Experience with cloud-based testing platforms such as Sauce Labs or BrowserStack

Joining Xotiv Technologies offers you the opportunity to work on innovative projects with a passionate and talented team, in a supportive and inclusive environment. If you are a driven professional with a passion for quality and innovation, we invite you to apply and become a part of our journey.

To apply, please submit your resume and cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and qualifications.

title: Software Test Engineer
description:
A software tester is responsible for designing test scenarios for software usability, running these tests, and preparing reports on the effectiveness and defects to the production team. A software tester is also known as a software test engineer or a quality assurance (QA) tester.

Software Testers are responsible for the quality of software development and deployment. They are involved in performing automated and manual tests to ensure the software created by developers is fit for purpose. Some of the duties include analysis of software and systems, mitigating risk and preventing software issues.

**Software Tester Responsibilities:**

❖ Reviewing software requirements and preparing test scenarios.

❖ Executing tests on software usability.

❖ Analyzing test results on database impacts, errors or bugs, and usability.

❖ Preparing reports on all aspects related to the software testing carried out and reporting to the design team.

❖ Interacting with clients to understand product requirements.

❖ Participating in design reviews and providing input on requirements, product design, and potential problems.

❖ Execute all levels of testing (System, Integration, and Regression)

❖ Design and develop automation scripts when needed

❖ Detect and track software defects and inconsistencies

**Software Tester requirements and qualifications:**

⮚ A bachelor's degree in computer science or related field.

⮚ Up-to-date knowledge of software test design and testing methodologies.

⮚ Knowledge of the following testing methods.

o Functional Testing

o Usability Testing

o Regression Testing

o Compatibility Testing

o Performance Testing

o Load and Stress Testing

⮚ Working knowledge of different test techniques.

⮚ Working knowledge of programming.

⮚ Excellent communication and critical thinking skills

⮚ Good organizational skills and a detail-oriented mindset.

Tools/ Technologies are Used:

● Selenium

● Jest

● Mocha

● Cypress

● Jira

● Bugzilla

● Zephyr scale

**Overview Of Software Testing Team:**

A Software tester (software test engineer) should be capable of designing test suites and should have the ability to understand usability issues. Such a tester is expected to have sound knowledge of software test design and test execution methodologies. It is very important for a software tester to have great communication skills so that he can interact with the development team efficiently. The roles and responsibilities for a usability software tester are as follows:

* A Software Tester is responsible for designing testing scenarios for usability testing.
* He is responsible for conducting the testing, thereafter analyze the results and then submit his observations to the development team.
* He may have to interact with the clients to better understand the product requirements or in case the design requires any kind of modifications.
* Software Testers are often responsible for creating test-product documentation and also have to participate in a testing-related walk-through.

title: Technician
description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

 **Job description**  

We are looking for an Oracle Cloud CPQ Tester with total experience of 4 to 7 years of experience who can understand business requirement and technical requirements and create functional test scenarios/test cases.Perform manual testing and automate the same scenarios using Autmation tools such as UFT,Selenium,TestNG etc.

 **Experience**

* Should be technically strong on SQL and working experience in Oracle Cloud CPQ environment.
* Good knowledge on Test Case preparation, review & execution, defects review and management.
* Worked in both Agile & Waterfall testing methodologies.
* Hands on experience in Oracle Applications R12 E-Business Suite modules like Order Management, O2C, P2P,INV,OM,AR modules.
* Having good experience in End-to-End testing involving O2C module.
* Experience in interface testing which involves middleware services and integration with multiple applications.
* Good knowledge of SDLC, Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC) and different testing methodologies.
* Good knowledge in tools like HP ALM [Quality Centre], SQL Developer, Postman, Swagger, ADO, TFS,JIRA

 **Must Have Skills:**

* Overall 4 to 6 years of QA experience
* Experience working with in Oracle Cloud CPQ ,Oracle Databases and Salesforce Cloud
* Strong Experience (3 to 4 years) with Web based testing including GUI Testing, Functional Testing, Integration Testing & Regression Testing
* Expertise in analyzing User Requirements, Functional and Technical Specifications
* Expertise in designing Test Scenarios, developing, and maintaining Test Cases.
* Strong verbal and written communication skills
* Good to have automation testing using Selenium Web driver, Test NG, Page Object Model, Hybrid framework.
* Experience in developing Test scripts using Element locators, Web Driver Methods, Java programming features, POM (Page Object Model), TestNG Annotations, Junit, Cucumber, GIT Repository and Maven
* Experience with continuous integration tools like Jenkins.
* Experience working with defect management tool like Jira
* Experienced working with release procedures, test methodologies, QA process and software defect tracking; demonstrated expert level on implementing test methodologies.

 **Key Responsibilities**

* Ability to work with clients to identify business challenges and prepare Test scenarios used
* Create Test plans, Identification and Implementation of test scenarios/test cases
* Daily tracking of Functional Defects & Defined Defect Management process for the project and prepare root cause analysis & Risk Analysis report.
* Contribution to process review and improvement
* Implement best practices, following Testing life cycle process
* Collaborates with software team in continuous build and deployment process
* Involve in functional & Non-Functional Testing (Smoke testing, sanity testing, regression testing, System Integration Testing, E2E Testing, UAT, API testing), UI/UX testing .

 **EY | Building a better working world**

  

  

EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.

  

  

Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.

  

  

Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

title: Software Test Engineer
description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
Job Description:
Company Overview
Ingram Micro is an integral part of the technology ecosystems, helping our partners grow and thrive through the creation and delivery of Information Technology, Cloud solutions and Lifecycle services. With more than $54 billion in revenue and the ability to reach 90% of the global population, we are one of the world’s largest technology distributors, serving our partners through operations in 61 countries with 29,000 associates.
Ingram Micro is the business behind the world’s brands, providing more ways to realize the promise of technology. We are on a path to transform Ingram Micro into a Digital Platform Business, based on experience and outcomes. Our strategy is intently focused on three main users (Customer, Associate, Vendor) of our Digital Platform, which will be connected via Data and Intelligence. These platforms together are the Ingram Micro Xvantage™  

Job Information
Our challenge is to use modern tools, techniques, and methods to develop, modify, and/or update complex and extremely powerful systems. Our customers and partners need applications that enable them to easily operate and expand their businesses. Ingram Micro is a $50B revenue a year company, with $5B of that revenue going through our team's eCommerce web site.
Ingram Micro is seeking experienced software engineers who can leverage their skill-set to grow as part of an Agile SCRUM team. They must be a quick learner and love challenging themselves to constantly raise the bar. This opportunity requires strong problem-solving skills, an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication as they deliver efficient, well designed, and tested software for a positive user experience. Innovative thinking and well-designed products with an emphasis on performance are a necessity to give our customers the best experience possible.
Key Job Functions/ Requirements* Responsible for designing, developing and maintaining test cases and test strategies to meet release deliverables, project testing requirements and other quality assurance considerations
* Lead the development of the testing strategy for the SCRUM team
* Lead the overall testing effort, directing other QA Testers as needed
* Perform test analysis on assigned user stories review acceptance criteria, collaborate with product owner /contribute on completeness of user stories.
* Develop & Executes detailed test cases; performs complex manual, integration, and regression tests.
* Documents defects/bugs and enhancement requests and assists development with concise and detailed steps for duplication of the problems found while performing manual functional, integration, and regression tests.
* Assists fellow agile team members and customers with problem reporting and resolution and maintaining appropriate follow-up communications throughout the defect resolution process.
* Contributes towards QA Story points estimation and test scheduling process
* Creates high level test flows/ procedures with clearly defined test objectives
* Work closely with the development staff to ensure that issues/defects are dealt with in a timely manner
* Participate in Deployment Testing exercises as needed
* Participate contribute Sprint planning sessions
* Participate in all SCRUM events, including Backlog Grooming, Sprint Planning, daily stand-up and Sprint Review

  

Education* Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent


Minimum Experience* 6+ years


Specialized Knowledge & Skills* Expert in quality assurance engineering of complex web applications
* Expert in applying testing principles and black box testing techniques like Boundary value analysis, Equivalence partitioning, Decision Table, Error Guessing etc.
* Experience in setting up the correct assurance processes at appropriate testing level, advocates and blends different testing types to maximize coverage taking quality to the new standards
* Proficient in creating test scenarios, test cases, test plans and performing test execution efficiently by prioritizing test cases
* Experience performing gap analysis and improvising the test coverage of complex product
* Proficient in functional testing of web services using any of the testing tools Postman, SoapUI or Swagger UI
* Experience with any leading test management tools like Test Rail, Xray, Zephyr, HP ALM or Microsoft Test Manager
* Excellent understanding working in Agile QA methodology, life cycle and processes
* Experience in utilizing test data or service response mock up tools (like Parasoft) to complement integration or end to end testing
* Proven experience of maintaining quality metrices and plan the next steps to improve the quality figures
* Experience of performance testing, load testing, stress testing and execution of these tests using any of the popular performance testing framework (Jmeter, Loadrunner etc)
* Ability to make decisions being the gate keeper for quality of complex product or suite of products
* Knowledgeable in test automation of UI and API behaviors, CI/CD set up, Selenium and Rest Assured tools
* Mindset to appreciate continuous deployments and DevOps
* Experience on highlighting quality risks, creating and implementing mitigation plan
* Knowledge of accessibility testing tools (Axe Accessibility, IBM Equal Access, Site Improve etc) is a plus

title: Senior Software Test Engineer
description:

Full time**Type Of Hire :**

Are you ready to unleash your full potential? We’re looking for people who are passionate about payments to chart Worldpay’s path to being the largest and most-loved payments company in the world.

**About the team**


We are leading eCommerce payment processor solution for US & Canada. It accepts payments from major card brands (VISA, MasterCard, AMEX, Discover), ACH, mobile & digital wallets, gift cards, etc. It is US’s largest debit and credit card processor with average of 35 million mobile, online, and in-store payments per day. It also provides international merchants a “one stop shop” integration for global and US payment processing. Value added services provide merchants with the most advanced tools and data they need to increase and protect their revenue, reduces costs and grow with experts.You will get an opportunity to work on the Cloud native microservices for Cards Payment connector and Account updater services as part of Tech modernization project that uses cutting edge technology stack. You will get to be part of the group that takes pride in its engineering/people culture and uses market leading agile practices such as SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework).

 **What you will do:**

* Develops, maintains and upgrades manual or automated test scripts, utilities, simulators, data sets and other programmatic test tools required to execute test plans.
* Performs usability testing for total system performance, reliability, scalability and security.
* Effectively communicates testing activities and findings in oral and written forms.
* Controls and manages own daily test activities.
* Provides internal quality assurance.
* Supports test lead to identify risks and develops mitigation strategies.
* Organizes and maintains the test script library.
* Other related duties assigned as needed.

 **What you bring**:

* Understanding of Fundamental Python frameworks & libraries. Python debugging
* Can handle python maintenance task if required for any enhancement.

title: Quality Analyst
description:
**Job Overview:**
We are seeking a detail-oriented and highly motivated Manual QA Tester to join our dynamic team. As a Manual QA Tester, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our software products before they are released to our customers.

**Job Responsibilities:**+ **Test Planning:**


	- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop test plans and test cases based on project requirements and specifications.
+ **Test Execution:**


	- Execute manual test cases, identify defects, and document test results meticulously. This includes functional, regression, and user acceptance testing .
+ **Bug Tracking:**


	- Effectively report and track defects, working closely with developers to ensure their resolution.
+ **Documentation:**


	- Create and maintain detailed test documentation, including test cases, test scripts, and test data.
+ **Test Environment Setup:**


	- Set up and configure test environments as needed to replicate production conditions.
+ **Quality Assurance Standards:**


	- Ensure that software testing processes and procedures are followed according to industry best practices and company standards.
+ **Collaboration:**


	- Collaborate with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and resolve issues.
+ **Test Automation:**


	- Identify opportunities for test automation and work with the automation team to implement automated test scripts.
**Job Qualifications:**+ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent work experience).
+ Proven experience in manual software testing, including test case design and execution.
+ Familiarity with software testing methodologies, test design, and defect tracking.
+ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen eye for detail.
+ Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
+ Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
+ Knowledge of test automation tools and frameworks (a plus but not required).
**Preferred Qualifications:**+ Overall experience must be 2+ years
+ Manual testing - 2+ years

This position offers a great opportunity to work on new and exciting projects. QA testers run various tests on software to ensure it meets all standards and guidelines and is ready to be marketed to consumers. title: Readyapi Tester
description:
We are seeking a skilled ReadyAPI Tester to join our quality assurance team. As a ReadyAPI Tester, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and executing test cases for APIs and web services using ReadyAPI tools. You will work closely with development teams to ensure the reliability, performance, and security of our software products.


**Responsibilities:**


* Develop test plans, test cases, and test scripts for API and web services testing using ReadyAPI tools (SoapUI, LoadUI, Secure, and ServiceV Pro).
* Execute test cases manually and automate test scenarios using Groovy scripting within ReadyAPI.
* Identify, report, and track defects using issue tracking systems (e.g., JIRA) and collaborate with development teams to resolve issues.
* Perform regression testing, smoke testing, and sanity testing as needed to validate software changes and releases.
* Conduct performance testing and analyze test results to identify bottlenecks and areas for optimization.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on testing priorities, timelines, and deliverables.
* Participate in Agile ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.

* Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* years of experience in software testing, with a focus on API and web services testing.
* Proficiency in ReadyAPI tools (SoapUI, LoadUI, Secure, and ServiceV Pro) and Groovy scripting for test automation.
* Solid understanding of API testing methodologies, including RESTful and SOAP services.
* Experience with issue tracking systems such as JIRA.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced Agile development environment.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
company: Estro Tech Robotics and Innovations Pvt. Ltd.
description:
As a QA Engineer specializing in web development, your role will be to ensure the quality and reliability of web applications throughout the development process. You will work closely with the development team to identify and resolve issues, conduct thorough testing, and implement effective quality assurance strategies. Your attention to detail, strong analytical skills, and understanding of web technologies will contribute to the success of our web development projects.

Responsibilities:

* Test Planning and Strategy: Collaborate with the development team to develop comprehensive test plans and strategies for web applications, ensuring all functional and non-functional requirements are met.
* Test Case Development: Create and maintain detailed test cases, scenarios, and scripts based on project requirements and specifications, covering both manual and automated testing approaches.
* Test Execution: Conduct thorough testing of web applications to identify bugs, usability issues, performance problems, and other defects. Perform functional, regression, integration, and cross-browser testing to ensure the application works as intended across different platforms and browsers.
* Defect Tracking and Management: Use defect tracking tools to accurately report, track, and prioritize issues found during testing. Collaborate with developers to ensure timely resolution of defects and verify fixes.
* Test Automation: Identify opportunities for test automation and develop automated test scripts using appropriate tools and frameworks. Execute automated tests to improve efficiency and accuracy in the testing process.
* Documentation: Document test procedures, test results, and other relevant information to maintain a comprehensive record of testing activities. Prepare clear and concise reports summarizing findings, test coverage, and overall application quality.
* Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with developers, project managers, and other stakeholders to communicate test progress, risks, and quality-related issues. Participate in project meetings, provide input on quality aspects, and contribute to continuous improvement efforts.
* Quality Assurance Processes: Contribute to the establishment and enhancement of quality assurance processes, methodologies, and best practices to ensure the delivery of high-quality web applications.

Qualification and Requirements:

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a QA Engineer or Tester with a focus on web development.
* Strong understanding of web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and web frameworks (e.g., React, Angular).
* Proficiency in using testing tools and frameworks (e.g., Selenium WebDriver, Cypress, JUnit, TestNG).
* Experience with defect tracking and test management tools (e.g., Jira, TestRail, HP ALM).
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies and working in an Agile development environment.
* Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git) and continuous integration/delivery processes.
* Solid understanding of software testing principles, techniques, and best practices.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen eye for detail.
* Strong communication and collaboration abilities with the ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment.
* Self-motivated, proactive, and able to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.

ISTQB or other relevant certifications (optional but preferred).

Experience: 0 - 1.5 years.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Fresher

Salary: ₹300,000.00 - ₹350,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* Health insurance

Schedule:

* Day shift

Work Location: In person

Application Deadline: 20/03/2024

title: Quality Assurance Tester
description:
We are seeking a meticulous Software Quality Assurance Tester to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of our software products through rigorous testing and validation processes. You will collaborate closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to identify issues, perform testing activities, and ensure that our software meets the highest standards of quality. If you have a keen eye for detail, strong analytical skills, and a passion for delivering exceptional user experiences, we d love to hear from you.


**Responsibilities:**


* Develop and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts to verify software functionality, performance, and reliability.


* Conduct various types of testing, including functional testing, regression testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing (UAT).


* Identify, document, and prioritize defects, ensuring accurate and detailed descriptions for efficient resolution.


* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand product requirements and design test cases that effectively validate software functionality and user experience.


* Utilize testing tools and frameworks to automate repetitive test cases and improve testing efficiency.


* Perform exploratory testing to uncover usability issues, edge cases, and potential areas of improvement.


* Participate in agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and sprint reviews to provide testing status updates and identify potential risks.


* Maintain test environments and test data to ensure consistency and reliability across testing cycles.


* Continuously monitor and improve the quality assurance process, identifying opportunities for optimization and enhancement.


* Provide timely and accurate reports on testing progress, defect metrics, and overall product quality to stakeholders.



**Requirements:**


* Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).


* Proven experience as a Software Quality Assurance Tester or similar role, with a strong understanding of software testing methodologies and best practices.


* Familiarity with manual testing techniques and test case management tools.


* Experience with test automation tools such as Selenium, Cypress, or Appium is a plus.


* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and isolate issues effectively.


* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work closely with cross-functional teams.


* Detail-oriented mindset with a focus on delivering high-quality results.


* Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, agile environment with tight deadlines and changing priorities.


* Experience with agile methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban.


* Knowledge of software development life cycle (SDLC) principles and practices.

title: Senior Quality Assurance Analyst
description:
**Job Purpose**

ICE MT is seeking a Senior Quality Assurance Analyst who has experience in the Mortgage domain. This role will be responsible for building & reviewing complex test scenarios, writing & executing test cases and ensuring quality releases. There will be exposure to automation test frameworks and automation test script maintenance.


The ideal candidate will be results-oriented, self-motivated and can thrive in a fast-paced environment. This role requires frequent interactions with project and product managers, developers, QA and other stakeholders, in order to ensure delivery of a world class solutions to our users.


**Responsibilities**

* Ability to blend analytical/technical skills to test functionality.
* Interact effectively across multiple teams and functions.
* Design/execute/validate complex test cases.
* Responsible for documenting clear and detailed defects including steps to reproduce actual and expected results.
* Willingness to be adaptable with a team first focus.
* Participate in demos, retrospectives, and contribute to continuous improvements.
* Diagnose problems and report bugs/observations.
* Review existing testing processes and procedures for efficiency gains.
* Defect Management: Responsible for documenting clear and detailed defects including steps to reproduce actual and expected results.
* Work closely with Product, Developers, QA and other project team members to analyze test results, locate problems, identify root causes and develop solutions.
* Work closely with Automation Engineers to ensure the test cases are automated as documented.
* Flexible to work on different project based on company needs.
* May require overtime or off-peak hours to meet commitments.

**Knowledge and Experience**

* Computer Science Degree or equivalent from a fully accredited college or university.
6+ years* experience working as a Manual Tester
* Experience working in the Mortgage Domain preferable on a Loan Origination System.
* Understand various test levels such as unit testing, functional testing, integration testing, regression testing and end to end testing.
* Understand and implement Risk Based Testing as needed.
* Familiarity with relational databases and intermediate SQL.
* Familiarity with Jira, Confluence, Jenkins, Git and Postman.
* Working experience on APIs, JSON, and XML files
* Understand the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC).
* Ability to effectively communicate relevant project information with coworkers, peers, and management through written and verbal communication.

**Schedule**

This role offers work from home flexibility of up to 2 days per week.

title: Quality Assurance Tester
description:
**About the Role:**  

**Grade Level (for internal use):** 10
  
S&P Global Corporate
  
  

**The Role:** QA Tester SFTP team
  
  

**The Team:** The data delivery team provides a platform for distributing data to clients. The platform is widely used within the company and serves many external clients.
  
  

**The Impact:** Delivering data to clients in a timely manner is key to the success of the company. As a software engineer, you will focus on reliability, performance and scalability. As a front-end engineer, you will have a direct impact on the user-friendliness of the product. As the UI for onboarding clients is a new application, you will be able to participate in building this from the ground up.
  
  

**What’s in it for you:**  

Dynamic environment with challenging technical problems
  
Competitive salary and bonus package
  
Anchor/flex framework, with a mix of time in the office and option to work from home
  
The ability to participate in conferences and training
  
Five days for charity/volunteering
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

Responsible for automation framework development using Python.
  
Ensure overall Component SW quality before releasing to next level of testing.
  
Propose new tools/technique to develop the test automation capabilities further.
  
Responsible to manage the test environment for SFTP and GUI testing.
  
Create understandable, simple, scalable, and best quality automation test cases to verify and validate the software quality.
  
Responsible for verifying and validate the software quality.
  
Should support the development team to release the software on time.
  
Implement the new technique and innovative idea to reduce the test execution time and improve test quality.
  
Report the software defect in acceptable way on time.
  
Review the test cases.
  
  

**What We’re Looking For:**  

5+ Years of Experience in Test Automation as Test case Developer.
  
Knowledge of the Java programming language
  
Strong knowledge of the Python programming language.
  
Good knowledge and experience in tools like Jira, GitLab and Git.
  
Good Knowledge in AWS is an added asset.
  
Experience in test planning and automation test case designing.
  
Good oral and written communication skills.
  
Strong interest towards quality assurance.
  
Attention to procedures and guidelines.
  
Exposure to working with CI/CD Tools
  
Knowledge of the C/C++ programming language is a plus.
  
  

About S&P Global Market Intelligence
  
  

At S&P Global Market Intelligence, a division of S&P Global we understand the importance of accurate, deep and insightful information. Our team of experts delivers unrivaled insights and leading data and technology solutions, partnering with customers to expand their perspective, operate with confidence, and make decisions with conviction.
  
  

For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence .
  
  

What’s In It For You?
  
  

**Our Purpose:**  

Progress is not a self-starter. It requires a catalyst to be set in motion. Information, imagination, people, technology–the right combination can unlock possibility and change the world.
  
  

Our world is in transition and getting more complex by the day. We push past expected observations and seek out new levels of understanding so that we can help companies, governments and individuals make an impact on tomorrow. At S&P Global we transform data into Essential Intelligence®, pinpointing risks and opening possibilities. We Accelerate Progress.
  
  

**Our People:**  

We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide—so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.
  
  

From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We’re committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. We’re constantly seeking new solutions that have progress in mind. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.
  
  

**Our Values:**  

Integrity, Discovery, Partnership
  
  

At S&P Global, we focus on Powering Global Markets. Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.
  
  

**Benefits:**  

We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S&P Global.
  
  

**Our benefits include:**  

**Health & Wellness:** Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
  
  

**Flexible Downtime:** Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
  
  

**Continuous Learning:** Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
  
  

**Invest in Your Future:** Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
  
  

**Family Friendly Perks:** It’s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families.
  
  

**Beyond the Basics:** From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.
  
**For more information on benefits by country visit:** https://www.spglobal.com/en/careers/our-culture/
  
  

**Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion at S&P Global:**  

At S&P Global, we believe diversity fuels creative insights, equity unlocks opportunity, and inclusion drives growth and innovation – Powering Global Markets. Our commitment centers on our global workforce, ensuring that our people are empowered to bring their whole selves to work. It doesn’t stop there, we strive to better reflect and serve the communities in which we live and work, and advocate for greater opportunity for all.

title: Quality Assurance Manager
description:
Are you a detail-oriented leader who can juggle multiple hats, ensuring seamless collaboration between design, engineering, and testing teams? If so, we're looking for YOU! Join us as a QA Lead and become the champion of quality for our products, applications, and systems.
**What you'll do.**This isn't your typical QA role. We're looking for someone who goes beyond finding and reporting issues. You'll own end-to-end QA, proactively assessing reliability and quality through manual and automated testing. Think of it as being a quality ensuring and every update pushes the product forward, not back.
**Your Key Focus Areas:*** You'll delve deep, ensuring features work flawlessly and deliver on user needs.
* You'll have an eagle eye for visual glitches and usability issues, crafting an intuitive and delightful experience.
* Performance matters! You'll pinpoint and eliminate any bottlenecks, keeping our systems lightning-fast.
* Go beyond the surface. You'll analyze product-level metrics to understand how updates impact user behavior and overall success.

**What You Bring to the Table:*** Nothing escapes your gaze, ensuring every pixel and function is perfect.
* You seamlessly bridge the gap between teams, fostering collaboration and clear understanding.
* Manual and automated testing are your playground. You create, execute, and analyze with expertise.
* You have an unwavering passion for excellence and a drive to continuously improve.

**QA Tester responsibilities include:*** Reviewing and analyzing system specifications
* Executing test scripts and reviewing results
* Reporting and documenting technical issues

  
* At least 1 year of experience testing a product at scale. Ideally, 1-3 years of overall experience.
* Proven experience as a Quality Assurance Tester or similar role
* Experience in QA methodology
* Familiarity with regression testing is a plus
* Ability to document and troubleshoot errors
* Working knowledge of test management software.
* Excellent communication skills
* Attention to detail
* Analytical mind and problem-solving aptitude
* Strong organizational skills

Education, age, or gender do not matter.
  
Refrens.com, the leading business operating system, has established itself as a go-to platform for freelancers, agencies, and small businesses worldwide. With over 350k+ business sign-ups across 178 countries, Refrens offers a comprehensive suite of features, including bookkeeping, lead management, and online networking.
Refrens has raised funding from CRED founder Kunal Shah, Paytm founder Vijay Shekhar Sharma, Indiamart founder Dinesh Agarwal, and Shaadi.com founder and Shark Tank judge Anupam Mittal, among others.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
Moody’s is a developmental culture where we value candidates who are willing to grow. So, if you are excited about this opportunity but don’t meet every single requirement, please apply! You may be a perfect fit for this role or other open roles.


Moody's is a global integrated risk assessment firm that empowers organizations to make better decisions.


At Moody’s, we’re taking action. We’re hiring diverse talent and providing underrepresented groups with equitable opportunities in their careers. We’re educating, empowering and elevating our people, and creating a workplace where each person can be their true selves, reach their full potential and thrive on every level. Learn more about our DE&I initiatives, employee development programs and view our annual DE&I Report at moodys.com/diversity




**Company Overview:** Moody's Analytics Inc. is at the forefront of financial technology, revolutionizing the landscape with cutting-edge solutions. We are seeking an accomplished Senior QA Automation Engineer with 3-5 years of expertise to lead our automation initiatives and contribute to the delivery of top-tier software products.




**Responsibilities:**




* **Automation Leadership:**




+ Drive the automation strategy by designing, implementing, and executing automated tests.
+ Champion the adoption of automation best practices within the QA team.




* **Test Execution Excellence:**




+ Write, execute, and continuously enhance automated test scripts to validate software functionality.
+ Leverage automation tools, particularly Selenium and Playwright, to ensure robust test coverage.




* **Results Analysis and Reporting:**




+ Analyze and interpret automated test results, providing insightful reports to the project team.
+ Collaborate with manual testers and stakeholders to ensure a holistic approach to quality assurance.




* **Artifact Maintenance:**




+ Maintain and update automation scripts and testing artifacts to reflect evolving requirements.




* **Test Data Management:**




+ Utilize advanced queries to create and manage test data, ensuring its relevance to automated tests.




* **Automation Framework Development:**




+ Take a lead role in developing and enhancing automation framework modules to meet specific testing requirements.




* **Collaboration and Mentorship:**




+ Work closely with manual testers, Business Analysts, and team members to foster a collaborative testing environment.
+ Mentor junior team members, sharing automation expertise and best practices.




**Qualifications:**




* Undergraduate/first-level degree (e.g., bachelor’s degree).
* 5+ years of QA experience with a strong emphasis on automation.
* Extensive hands-on experience in automation scripts development using Selenium or Playwright or Cypress.
* Proven expertise in designing and implementing automation frameworks.
* In-depth understanding of the SDLC and QA methodologies, including test planning.
* Knowledge of web-based technology architecture, data structures, and RESTful APIs.
* Proficiency in C#, Java, and/or scripting languages.
* Experience with automated testing tools and environments.
* Strong database skills and the ability to manage test data effectively.
* Ability to work within the constructs of an agile process, including SCRUM, Continuous Build and Integration, etc.
* Capability to handle multiple projects concurrently, delivering high-quality results under tight deadlines.
* Exceptional verbal and written communication skills.
* Analytical mindset with a keen attention to detail.
* Critical thinking skills for thorough analysis of system requirements and test scenarios.


If you are a seasoned QA Automation Engineer with a passion for driving automation excellence and want to be part of a transformative journey, we invite you to apply. Join us in shaping the future of financial technology. Apply now to contribute your expertise to our innovative team at Moody's Analytics Inc.




Moody’s is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender expression, gender identity or any other characteristic protected by law.  

  

Candidates for Moody's Corporation may be asked to disclose securities holdings pursuant to Moody’s Policy for Securities Trading and the requirements of the position. Employment is contingent upon compliance with the Policy, including remediation of positions in those holdings as necessary.  

  

For more information on the Securities Trading Program, please refer to the STP Quick Reference guide on ComplianceNet  

  

Please note: STP categories are assigned by the hiring teams and are subject to change over the course of an employee’s tenure with Moody’s.

title: Quality Assurance Analyst
description:
**QA & Testing Senior Analyst [Functional Tester]**

**Band 3**

**About Cigna:**


Cigna exists to improve lives. Together, with our 74, 000 employees worldwide that service Cigna, Express Scripts and other affiliate customers, we aspire to transform health services, making them more affordable and accessible to millions.


We are going through an exciting period of expansion; at the centre of our International division’s ambitious growth strategy we are currently working towards multi-year effort to implement a consistent digital strategy for the International Market.

**The Position:**


Reporting to EGS Service Delivery Lead, the successful candidate will be responsible for on time delivery of test planning and executions activities in the delivery of Quality Assurance (QA) Testing for new or modified applications/systems across multiple platforms. The QA & Testing Senior Analyst will be a high-performing individual who is methodical, inquisitive and has a passion for quality. They will partner with their Scrum Team and business colleagues on a journey of continuous learning and improvement to ensure ongoing optimisation of quality first delivery capability in support of key strategic outcomes for our business.


Working across our IM IT Team to deliver successful QA & Testing solutions enabling all methodologies but with a focus on SAFe Agile. You will work with individuals from across the world, with both in-person and remote teams.

**Main Duties / Responsibilities:**

* Responsible for delivery QA targets for the assigned projects
* Product understanding and creating test design
* Execute test cases and report bugs on the tool
* Determine priority for test cases and create effective execution plans
* Participate in defect triage and RCA
* Participate in PI & Sprint planning and Agile ceremonies
* Track & report progress of testing as per the plan
* Contribute towards Sprint retrospective and continuous improvement initiatives
* Implement test techniques , methodologies and tools to achieve high-level of test coverage
* Mentoring & developing the Junior resources
* Adheres to the organization's Quality Engineering best practices and help to drive changes to achieve more efficiency

**Required Skills and Experience:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related discipline and at least two, typically five or more years’ experience in a system quality environment, or an equivalent combination of education and work experience
* 4 - 6 Yrs. experience in Software QA & Testing
* Good experience in functional testing of web application, desktop application and mainframe application
* Good experience of working in all phase of Test Cycle (Test Design, Test Execution, Defect management & reporting)
* Knowledge of the Health Insurance Industry
* Broad knowledge of the Software Delivery Lifecycle with specific expertise of Software Testing
* Proven experience of working within an Agile environment
* Broad knowledge of automated testing and modelling tools
* Great knowledge of change management and test case generation techniques
* Experience of mobile testing delivery and techniques
* Good knowledge of different web browsers like Internet Explorer, Firefox, MS Edge, Chrome
* Competent user of Microsoft office applications like Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Outlook
* Excellent written and oral communication skills
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
* Comfortable working independently, leading a team or as part of a team
* Demonstrate accuracy and possess a keen eye for detail
* Strong interest in personal development

**Desirable Skills and Experience**

* Finance business knowledge
* ISTQB Foundation or Intermediate Certified
* Knowledge of relational databases using SQL queries
* Web based software development, especially using Java and HTML
* Salesforce & Vlocity Technology experience
* HP ALM, Azure Dev Ops – Test Plans
* Mainframe, DB & API testing
* Selenium/UFT skills

**About The Cigna Group**

Cigna Healthcare, a division of The Cigna Group, is an advocate for better health through every stage of life. We guide our customers through the health care system, empowering them with the information and insight they need to make the best choices for improving their health and vitality. Join us in driving growth and improving lives.

title: Quality Assurance Tester
description:
Spiderweb Technologies is at the forefront of developing innovative solutions that enhance user experiences across various digital platforms. We are dedicated to maintaining high-quality standards for our products and services, ensuring they meet and exceed the expectations of our users and clients.

\\*\\*Position Overview:\\*\\*

We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Quality Assurance (QA) Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software testing with a keen eye for detail. This role involves designing and executing test plans to ensure our applications, specifically messaging applications like WhatsApp, function correctly, are bug-free, and provide a seamless user experience.

\\*\\*Key Responsibilities:\\*\\*

- Develop, document, and maintain functional test cases for new and existing features, focusing on the functionalities of deleting messages (for me and for everyone) and clearing chats in both two-user conversations and group chats.

- Execute test plans thoroughly to ensure that all critical features work as intended across different devices and operating systems.

- Identify, record, and track bugs and inconsistencies, providing detailed descriptions of issues and the steps to reproduce them.

- Work closely with the development team to prioritize and resolve bugs.

- Stay updated with new testing tools and test strategies.

\\*\\*Assignment Task:\\*\\*

As part of the application process, you are required to complete a task:

- \\*\\*Write detailed and comprehensive test cases for critical features in a messaging application (WhatsApp).\\*\\* This assignment focuses on the functionalities of deleting messages (for me and for everyone), clearing chats for both two-user conversations and group chats, on the WhatsApp application.

\\*\\*Submission Instruction:\\*\\*

- Upon completion, compile your test cases in a Google Sheet.

- Adjust the sharing settings to "Anyone with the link can view" to ensure the hiring team can access and review your submission.

- Share the Google Sheet link with us in your application to the following e-mails:

**amitgarg87@gmail.com**

\\*\\*Requirements:\\*\\*

- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.

- Proven experience as a QA tester or similar role.

- Familiarity with QA methodologies and software testing tools.

- Experience in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test cases.

- Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes.

- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

- Good communication skills and the ability to work well in a team environment.

\\*\\*How to Apply:\\*\\*

Please submit your resume, cover letter, and the Google Sheet link containing your test cases for the assigned task. Ensure your application clearly demonstrates your ability to perform detailed and comprehensive software testing.

\\*\\*[Company's Hiring Process, Benefits, and Other Relevant Information]\\*\\*

[Your Company Name] is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹8,000.00 - ₹25,000.00 per month

Benefits:

* Work from home

Schedule:

* Evening shift
* Fixed shift

Supplemental pay types:

* Yearly bonus

Work Location: Remote

**Speak with the employer**  
+91 9466814740  
Application Deadline: 08/03/2024

title: Senior Software Test Engineer
description:
**Experience : 5+ Years**

We are looking for an experienced Manual + Automation Tester with a minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in software testing. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of both manual and automated testing methodologies, as well as a proven track record of successfully identifying, documenting, and resolving software defects. This role requires a meticulous attention to detail, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a collaborative team.

Key Responsibilities:

* Develop and execute comprehensive test plans and test cases for both manual and automated testing processes.
* Identify, document, and track software defects to resolution using designated bug tracking systems.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the quality and reliability of software products throughout the development lifecycle.
* Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts using industry-standard automation tools and frameworks.
* Conduct thorough regression testing to validate software changes and updates.
* Participate in agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospective meetings.
* Provide timely and accurate reports on testing progress, test coverage, and defect metrics to stakeholders.
* Stay up-to-date with industry best practices and emerging trends in software testing and quality assurance.
* Strong experience with test automation frameworks such as Selenium, Appium, or similar.
* Proven ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: ₹455,931.05 - ₹1,025,165.85 per year

Benefits:

* Health insurance
* Provident Fund

Schedule:

* Day shift

Experience:

* total work: 1 year (Preferred)

Ability to Commute:

* Noida, Uttar Pradesh (Required)

Ability to Relocate:

* Noida, Uttar Pradesh: Relocate before starting work (Required)

Work Location: In person

**Speak with the employer**  
+91 7678217003

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**Quality Assurance Engineer ( C#, BDD, Specflow)**

 **Would you enjoy testing innovative software for energy products?**

 **Do you like working in collaborative teams and solving critical issues?**

 **Join our Quality Assurance Team**

  

Our Digital Team partners with business units and clients to develop software and technical innovation. We collaborate with our development teams in science, mechanical and electrical engineering, physics, and geoscience to develop innovative software. We take responsibility for the business' success by building trusted relationships and understanding our partners.


As a Quality Assurance Engineer, You will be responsible for testing Web Applications & API. You will be involved in Functional & Automated Testing. You will be involved in Agile Software Development Approach. Job location- Kochi, India

  

As a Quality Assurance Engineer, you will be responsible for:

  

* Analyzing requirements, specifications and technical design documents and provide estimates.
* Creating test plans, strategies & test cases to attain 100% test coverage & developing & executing automation scripts.
* Documenting bug reports following agreed-upon processes upon discovery of quality problems & ensure minimal bug leakage

 **Fuel your passion**

  

To be successful in this role you will:

  

* Be a graduate in Computer Science or Engineering, with a minimum 5-8 yrs of professional experience
* Proficient in Selenium C#, BDD, Specflow, NUNIT Framework, Azure DevOps, SQL
* Have good knowledge of SW QA methodologies, tools & processes & experience writing comprehensive test plans & cases.
* Have hands-on experience in any of the tools- JIRA/Azure DevOps and good to have knowledge on Jenkins
* Preferred to be Certified Software Tester Foundation Level
* Have strong skills in performing data analysis, risk analysis, writing test cases for functional/ non-functional testing, and debugging skills
* Have experience in agile development approaches, preferably Scrum
* Hands-on experience with automated testing of API and UI
* Good knowledge of automation tools and common scripts and languages used in this area
* Preferrred to have knowledge in Jmeter or any performance tool

 **Work in a way that works for you**

  

We recognize that everyone is different and that the way in which people want to work and deliver at their best is different for everyone too. In this role, we can offer the following flexible working patterns:

  

* Starting early / finishing early
* Starting late / finishing late
* Working flexible hours - flexing the times you work in the day

 **Working with us**

  

Our people are at the heart of what we do at Baker Hughes. We know we are better when all of our people are developed, engaged and able to bring their whole authentic selves to work. We invest in the health and well-being of our workforce, train and reward talent and develop leaders at all levels to bring out the best in each other.

 **Working for you**

  

Our inventions have revolutionized energy for over a century. But to keep going forward tomorrow, we know we have to push the boundaries today. We prioritize rewarding those who embrace change with a package that reflects how much we value their input. Join us, and you can expect:

  

* Contemporary work-life balance policies and wellbeing activities
* Comprehensive private medical care options
* Safety net of life insurance and disability programs
* Tailored financial programs
* Additional elected or voluntary benefits
 **About Us:**
We are an energy technology company that provides solutions to energy and industrial customers worldwide. Built on a century of experience and conducting business in over 120 countries, our innovative technologies and services are taking energy forward – making it safer, cleaner and more efficient for people and the planet.  

**Join Us:**
Are you seeking an opportunity to make a real difference in a company that values innovation and progress? Join us and become part of a team of people who will challenge and inspire you! Let’s come together and take energy forward.  

  

Baker Hughes Company is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

title: Quality Assurance Tester
description:
**Job Purpose****:**



The QA Tester III holds a pivotal lead position, ensuring the delivery of top-notch software products by overseeing and guiding the testing efforts within the Scrum framework. With advanced expertise in software testing methodologies and a knack for leadership, the QA Tester III champions quality across all stages of product development, mentors QA team members, and liaises with cross-functional teams to ensure comprehensive test coverage.


**Essential Functions****:**


* **Test Strategy & Design:**
	+ Collaborate with product owners, developers, and stakeholders to grasp product requirements.
	+ Design detailed test strategies, ensuring comprehensive coverage while optimizing testing efforts.
* **Test Execution & Oversight:**
	+ Personally execute critical test scenarios while overseeing the team's test execution across various stages.
	+ Identify, log, prioritize, and drive the resolution of defects, ensuring thorough documentation.
* **Leadership & Mentorship:**
	+ Lead the QA team in daily activities, fostering a culture of quality and continuous improvement.
	+ Mentor junior testers, providing guidance, feedback, and training to enhance their skill sets.
* **QA Process & Continuous Improvement:**
	+ Evaluate and refine QA methodologies, introducing best practices to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.
	+ Champion the adoption of new testing tools and technologies that benefit the team and the broader organization.
* **Collaboration & Stakeholder Communication:**
	+ Act as the primary QA point of contact for Scrum ceremonies, ensuring QA perspectives are represented.
	+ Foster close collaboration with developers and other cross-functional teams, ensuring cohesive product development.
* **Documentation & Reporting:**
	+ Maintain meticulous documentation of test strategies, test results, and defect tracking.
	+ Provide regular testing insights, metrics, and updates to stakeholders.
* **Automation Strategy:**
	+ Guide the development and maintenance of automated test suites.
	+ Collaborate with developers to integrate tests into the CI/CD process.

**Education:**


* Four years of college resulting in a bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.


**Certifications, Accreditations, Licenses:**


* Any professional certification preferred.


**Experience:**


* 5-7 years


**Special Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:**


* 5+ years of experience in software quality assurance testing, with prior leadership or mentorship experience.
* Proficiency in QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
* In-depth experience with manual and automated testing.
* Familiarity with agile methodologies, especially Scrum.
* Strong leadership, analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Experience with automated testing tools (e.g., Selenium, JUnit) is a plus.

**Supervisory Responsibility****:**



This position does not have employee direct reports but does serve as a "lead" role for others doing similar work.


**Work Environment****:**



This position is in Chennai / Bangalore / Gurgaon.

title: Testing (network Certification Tester)
description:
**Position Type :**

Full time**Type Of Hire :**

Experienced (relevant combo of work and education)**Education Desired :**

Bachelor of Computer Engineering**Travel Percentage :**

1 - 5%**Are you curious, motivated, and forward-thinking? At FIS you’ll have the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging and relevant issues in financial services and technology. Our talented people empower us, and we believe in being part of a team that is open, collaborative, entrepreneurial, passionate and above all fun.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**About the team**


This role is a part of our **Software Testing Team (Payment domain) in Retails Payment project.**

**What you bring:**

* Test Engineer with 8-20 years of experience in functional and certification testing.
* Good understanding of Software Testing Lifecycles.
* Experience in testing financial products in stand alone and cloud environment.
* Experience in Payment Technologies.
* Experience in working with card networks like Visa/MC/Rupay.
* Experience in Linux, Unix and Windows operating system, databases and basic knowledge in SQL.
* Experience in creating test scripts and test case automation.
* Good knowledge on test management, developing test data, analyzing test results, and maintaining test metrics.
* Ability to correlate business scenarios with test cases.
* Good testing knowledge on latest UI/UX framework and experience in cross browsers testing, Web services/API testing using tools like SOAP UI or Postman.
* Knowledge in payment products like IST, Data Navigator products preferred.
* Knowledge of financial simulators like Mastercard, VTS, Finsim preferred.

**What you will be doing****:**

* Develops, maintains, and upgrades manual or automated test scripts, utilities, simulators, data sets and other programmatic test tools required to execute test plans.
* Performs usability testing for total system performance, reliability, scalability, and security
* Effectively communicates testing activities and findings in oral and written forms.
* Controls and manages own daily test activities.
* Provides internal quality assurance.
* Supports test lead to identify risks and develops mitigation strategies.

**Added bonus if you have:**

* Knowledge of **FIS’ products and services.**
* Knowledge of financial services industry.
* Knowledge of basic financial analysis principles and ratios.


**What we offer you**

* An exciting opportunity be a part of **World’s Leading FinTech Product MNC.**
* To be a part of vibrant team and to build up a career on core banking/payments domain.
* Competitive salary and attractive benefits including GHMI/ Hospitalization coverage for employee and direct dependents.
* A multifaceted job with a high degree of responsibility and a broad spectrum of opportunities.

**Privacy Statement**


FIS is committed to protecting the privacy and security of all personal information that we process in order to provide services to our clients. For specific information on how FIS protects personal information online, please see the Online Privacy Notice.

**Sourcing Model**


Recruitment at FIS works primarily on a direct sourcing model; a relatively small portion of our hiring is through recruitment agencies. FIS does not accept resumes from recruitment agencies which are not on the preferred supplier list and is not responsible for any related fees for resumes submitted to job postings, our employees, or any other part of our company.
